attributes.additional_details: To ensure that pensioners incomes are protected against inflationary costs, and allow them to live and participate in society as equals, and with the dignity and respect they deserve.
attributes.background: Preserve the previous commitment by ministers to restore the ‘triple lock’ for 2023 and beyond.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625622
